SEARCH
Package com.example.teamalfred.database

Class DatabaseSchemaManagerTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.teamalfred.database.DatabaseSchemaManagerTest
public class DatabaseSchemaManagerTest extends Object
Integration tests for the DatabaseSchemaManager class using an IN-MEMORY SQLite database. Uses @BeforeEach and @AfterEach to set up the in-memory DB, reset the schema, and clean up.

  • Constructor Details

    • DatabaseSchemaManagerTest

      public DatabaseSchemaManagerTest()

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach public void setUp() throws SQLException
      This method runs BEFORE each test method in this class. Configures DatabaseConnection for in-memory use, gets a connection, initializes the schema manager, and resets the schema in the in-memory DB.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database connection or schema reset fails.

    • tearDown

      @AfterEach public void tearDown()
      This method runs AFTER each test method in this class. Resets the DatabaseConnection class, closing the connection to the in-memory DB.

    • testInitializeSchemaCreatesTable

      @Test public void testInitializeSchemaCreatesTable() throws SQLException
      Tests that the 'users' table is created successfully by initializeSchema(). Queries the sqlite_master table to check for existence.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database interaction fails.

    • testDropTableRemovesTable

      @Test public void testDropTableRemovesTable() throws SQLException
      Tests that the 'users' table is dropped successfully by dropTable(). Queries the sqlite_master table to confirm it no longer exists.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database interaction fails.

    • testInitializeSchemaCreatesCorrectTableStructure

      @Test public void testInitializeSchemaCreatesCorrectTableStructure() throws SQLException
      Integration test to verify the structure of the 'users' table after creation. Checks column names, data types, nullability, and primary key using metadata.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database metadata retrieval fails.
